processor¶

class Processor : public Node¶
#include <processor.hpp>

An Processor class object. This class object inherits rclcpp::Node object and acts the main bridge between the ROS2 interface and the underlying ort_cpp_lib library that is based on ONNXRuntime Library.

Public Functions

Processor(void)¶

A Constructor function.

void activate_image_callback(sensor_msgs::msg::Image::SharedPtr msg)¶

A mock callback function that calls image_callback for Testing.

void activate_localize_callback(sensor_msgs::msg::Image::SharedPtr msg, sensor_msgs::msg::Image::SharedPtr depth_msg, sensor_msgs::msg::CameraInfo::SharedPtr camera_info)¶

A mock callback function that calls localize_callback for Testing.

Private Types

typedef message_filters::sync_policies::ApproximateTime<sensor_msgs::msg::Image, sensor_msgs::msg::Image, sensor_msgs::msg::CameraInfo> SyncPolicy¶

An alias definition for SyncPolicy that is used below for sync_ object.

Private Functions

void localize_callback(const sensor_msgs::msg::Image::SharedPtr msg, const sensor_msgs::msg::Image::SharedPtr depth_msg, const sensor_msgs::msg::CameraInfo::SharedPtr camera_info)¶

A ROS2 callback function utilized by image_sub.

It gets ortAgent_ to initialize once and only once when the first input image is received.

It also populates the appropriate ROS messages with EPDImageClassification/ EPDObjectDetection when the onlyVisualize boolean flag is set to false.

.

void image_callback(const sensor_msgs::msg::Image::SharedPtr msg) const¶

Private Members

rclcpp::Subscription<sensor_msgs::msg::Image>::SharedPtr image_sub¶

A subscriber member variable to receive 2D RGB images to receive.

message_filters::Subscriber<sensor_msgs::msg::Image> localize_image_rgb¶

A policy-synchronized subscriber member variable to receive rectified 2D RGB images.

message_filters::Subscriber<sensor_msgs::msg::Image> localize_image_depth¶

A policy-synchronized subscriber member variable to receive rectified 2D Depth images.

message_filters::Subscriber<sensor_msgs::msg::CameraInfo> localize_cam_info¶

A policy-synchronized subscriber member variable to receive camera information.

message_filters::Synchronizer<SyncPolicy> sync_¶

A Synchronizer policy member variable.

rclcpp::Publisher<sensor_msgs::msg::Image>::SharedPtr visual_pub¶

A publisher member variable to output visualization of inference results.

rclcpp::Publisher<epd_msgs::msg::EPDImageClassification>::SharedPtr p1_pub¶

A publisher member variable to output Precision-Level 1 (P1) specific inference output suitable for external agents.

rclcpp::Publisher<epd_msgs::msg::EPDObjectDetection>::SharedPtr p2_pub¶

A publisher member variable to output Precision-Level 2 (P2) specific inference output suitable for external agents.

rclcpp::Publisher<epd_msgs::msg::EPDObjectDetection>::SharedPtr p3_pub¶

A publisher member variable to output Precision-Level 3 (P3) specific inference output suitable for external agents.

rclcpp::Publisher<epd_msgs::msg::EPDObjectLocalization>::SharedPtr localize_pub¶

A publisher member variable to output Precision-Level 3 (P3) specific inference output suitable for external agents.

EPD::EPDContainer ortAgent_¶

A singular EPDContainer object that deploys a user-defined ONNX model as an inference enginer using onnxruntime.
